default_product_info.table_description: Contains core, mandatory information for every product in the Awin system. It serves as the primary identification and search layer.

aw_deep_link.description: The unique Awin tracking link for the product.

product_name.description: The full title or name of the product.

aw_product_id.description: Awin's unique internal identifier for the product.

merchant_product_id.description: The unique ID assigned to the product by the merchant.

merchant_image_url.description: Direct URL to the product image on the merchant's server.

description.description: Detailed description of the product features.

merchant_category.description: The category name assigned by the merchant.

search_price.description: The current selling price used for search filtering.

recommended_metadata.table_description: Provides enriched metadata that improves the user experience, including store details, delivery costs, and synchronization timestamps.

description.description: Detailed description of the product features.

merchant_category.description: The category name assigned by the merchant.

category_id.description: Unique Awin ID for the category.

aw_image_url.description: URL of the product image cached by Awin.

store_price.description: Original price on the merchant's website.

merchant_deep_link.description: Direct URL to the merchant site without tracking.

language.description: Language code of the feed content.

last_updated.description: Timestamp of the last feed update.

display_price.description: Formatted price string with currency symbol.

data_feed_id.description: Unique identifier for the data feed file.

product_specifications.table_description: Detailed physical and technical attributes of the product, such as dimensions, brand, and model specifics.

aw_deep_link.description: The unique Awin tracking link for the product.

product_name.description: The full title or name of the product.

aw_product_id.description: Awin's unique internal identifier for the product.

merchant_product_id.description: The unique ID assigned to the product by the merchant.

merchant_image_url.description: Direct URL to the product image on the merchant's server.

description.description: Detailed description of the product features.

merchant_category.description: The category name assigned by the merchant.

search_price.description: The current selling price used for search filtering.

product_short_description.description: A brief summary of the product features.

condition.description: The state of the product (e.g., new, used).

model_number.description: Specific model number for the item.

dimensions.description: Physical size (H x W x D).

promotional_text.description: Marketing messages related to the product.

category_price_variability.table_description: Aggregated table focused on price range volatility per category. Used to identify categories with widest or narrowest price gaps.

category.description: The classification of the product in the e-commerce platform

product_count.description: Total number of products in this category.

minimum_price.description: The lowest search price found in this category.

maximum_price.description: The highest search price found in this category.

price_amplitude.description: The difference between the maximum and minimum price.

category_price_analysis.table_description: Aggregated table focused on average price levels per category. Includes amplitude to allow filtering for specific volatility scenarios.

category.description: The classification of the product in the e-commerce platform

average_price.description: The average search price of products in this category.

price_amplitude.description: The difference between max and min price, used for filtering narrowest/widest ranges.

category_price_classification.table_description: Segmentation of categories by price tiers (Lux, Medium, Cheap) based on global dataset statistics.

category.description: The classification of the product in the e-commerce platform

total_products.description: Total number of products in the category.

lux_count.description: Count of products classified as Luxury (> 90th percentile).

medium_count.description: Count of products between Median and 90th percentile.

cheap_count.description: Count of products classified as Budget (< Median).

lux_percentage.description: Percentage of Luxury products within the category.

medium_percentage.description: Percentage of Medium-tier products within the category.

cheap_percentage.description: Percentage of Budget products within the category.

price_discrepancy_audit.table_description: Audit table to monitor data consistency between search_price (backend) and display_price (frontend).

category.description: The classification of the product in the e-commerce platform

average_price_difference.description: Average difference between display price and search price.

count_with_discrepancy.description: Number of products where prices do not match.

total_checked_products.description: Total products with both prices available.

product_price_segmentation.table_description: Detailed classification of every product into price tiers (Cheap, Medium, Lux) based on global market statistics.

aw_product_id.description: Awin's unique internal identifier for the product.

product_name.description: The full name of the product.

category.description: The classification of the product in the e-commerce platform

search_price.description: The price used for the segmentation.

price_segment.description: The calculated label (Cheap, Medium, Lux) for this specific product.

brand_price_segmentation.table_description: Analysis of Brand positioning based on the average price of their products.

brand_name.description: The name of the brand or manufacturer.

total_products.description: Count of products associated with this brand.

average_brand_price.description: The average price of all products under this brand.

brand_segment.description: Classification of the brand (Cheap, Medium, Lux) relative to the global market.

merchant_price_segmentation.table_description: Analysis of Merchant positioning based on the average price of their catalog.

total_products.description: Count of products listed by this merchant.

average_merchant_price.description: The average price of all products sold by this merchant.

merchant_segment.description: Classification of the merchant (Cheap, Medium, Lux) relative to the global market.

merchant_category_segmentation.table_description: Analysis of Merchant-defined categories positioning based on average price.

merchant_category.description: The category name as defined by the merchant (not Awin standardized).

total_products.description: Count of products within this merchant category.

average_category_price.description: Average price of products in this category.

category_segment.description: Classification of the merchant category (Cheap, Medium, Lux).

merchant_brand_offering_segmentation.table_description: Associative table showing the price positioning of brands within specific merchants.

products_offered.description: Number of products of this brand sold by this merchant.

average_offering_price.description: Average price of this brand's products at this merchant.

offering_segment.description: Classification of this specific brand offering (Cheap/Medium/Lux) for this merchant.
